DESCRIPTION: Unbans a user from the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: Make sure the bot has the permissions to ban on your server.
TITLE: **{{username}}**, you have been **UNBANNED** from [**{{guildName}}**]
SUCCESS: Unbanned {{user}} from this server with reason: **{{reason}}**
NEED_BAN_PERMS: I do not have the Ban Members permission.
NOT_BANNED: I cannot unban this user because they are not banned.
NEED_USER: You did not provide a user to unban.
NEED_REASON: You must provide a reason in order to unban the user.
